title: Airbnb rolls out Rooms for cheaper rentals in people’s homes
description: Accommodation platform Airbnb has introduced 50 new features, as well as a new service focusing on room rentals in someone's home.

title: The average life span of your hard drive will shock you
description: New research shows that the typical hard drive may actually need to be replaced a lot sooner than many other components in your PC.

title: ‘Undersea space station’ takes big step toward deployment
description: The plan to build a new underwater research habitat has taken a significant step forward after NOAA inked a deal with the team behind the facility.
